name: Armageddon (itch) (ChiefCogMan)
description:
Alone,surrounded and waiting for help, a lone trooper must stand his ground after his squad was ambushed by growling monstrosities . With only his weapon at his side, he must hold of the horde until his escape reaches him.

Controls: W-up, A-left,S-down,D-right,hold left mouse button to shoot
